alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:22PM CDT until May 05 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN DESOTO AND CENTRAL TATE COUNTIES... At 322 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arkabutla, or 7 miles northwest of Senatobia, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hernando, Senatobia, Coldwater, Arkabutla, Strayhorn, Robinson Gin, Lurline, Alphaba, Crossroad, Sarah, Love, Poagville, New Town and Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
